common.title: ApplyGogo - AI-powered Employment Platform in Korea

hero.description: AI automatically performs English-to-Korean resume conversion, completing a professional Korean resume that Korean recruiters notice in minutes.
hero.subText: Start free without credit card ‚Ä¢ First 2 conversions free

cost.description: Receive expert-level results instantly at a reasonable price, without expensive fees and long waiting times.

features.title: Why ApplyGogo?
features.subtitle: We create Korean resumes optimized for the Korean job market

items.title: AI-Powered Summary
items.description: Gemini Pro analyzes your experience and reconstructs it into core achievement-oriented bullet points suitable for Korean companies.

items.title: Professional Translation
items.description: Compare and edit English/Korean simultaneously with Split View. Complete customization with direct editing.

items.title: Premium Templates
items.description: Choose from various templates like Modern, Professional, Executive and download as PDF immediately. Submit to companies right away.

steps.title: Complete in 3 Steps
steps.subtitle: Quick and easy without complex processes

items.title: Upload PDF
items.description: Upload your resume PDF with drag & drop

items.title: AI Conversion
items.description: AI automatically handles summary and translation. Direct editing available.

items.title: Download PDF
items.description: Export as PDF with your favorite template

recommended.item1Description: We provide global standard formats for those unfamiliar with foreign resume formats and CV translation.
recommended.item2Description: Coming across a job opportunity in Korea but need a Korean resume? Just upload your English resume and complete it in 5 minutes.
recommended.item3Description: Not just a translation, but a sophisticated Korean resume with polite expressions fitting 'Korean business etiquette'.

pricing.title: Simple Passes
pricing.subtitle: Start with a reasonable pass at a price you can't see anywhere else
pricing.footer: * 5 credits deducted for resume generation, free for pass holders or 1 credit for free users for re-translation.

items.q: Q. Does the format of the resume matter?
items.a: Yes, we support most PDF formats. AI extracts text and analyzes content, so complex formats are fine.

items.q: Q. Can I edit the translated content?
items.a: Of course. You can freely edit the summarized content and English translation in the editor provided after AI conversion. Refine it delicately by comparing with the original in Split View.

items.q: Q. Is the free plan sufficient?
items.a: We provide 10 credits per month for trial. It's enough to complete and download a resume, but we recommend a pass if you want various templates and unlimited editing.

cta.subtitle: No more worries about Korean resumes with ApplyGogo

hero.title:
Your Gateway to Korea,
Fast and Reliable
hero.description:
**ApplyGogo** was created for talents who miss out on global career opportunities due to language barriers and complex formats.
Prove your career to the world with the best AI technology.

values.title: Why ApplyGogo?
values.subtitle: Beyond simple translation, we create value that works in the job market

items.title: Global Standard
items.description: Resume formats preferred by Korean companies are unique. ApplyGogo AI learns Korean hiring trends to provide the most effective formats.

items.title: Context-Aware Translation
items.description: Not just a 1:1 literal translation, but a reconstruction into 'Business English' that highlights work performance and capabilities. We handle technical terms and nuances with care.

items.title: Overwhelming Time Saving
items.description: Shortens the work of converting English resumes to Korean from days to just 5 minutes. Invest your time in interview preparation.

process.title:
Eliminated Complexities,
Focused on the Core
process.description:
Just prepare your existing English resume PDF file.
ApplyGogo's AI engine will take care of the rest.
items: Start by uploading PDF without separate sign-up
AI automatically categorizes sections and summarizes content
Real-time preview and intuitive editing editor
Korean Standard Formatting

processingPage.title: AI Processing
processingPage.description: AI is analyzing your resume and reconstructing it into a professional Korean resume. Please wait a moment as sophisticated work from text extraction to core achievement selection and Korean translation is in progress.
processingPage.warning: For stable analysis, please keep this screen open. (Work may be interrupted if you leave the page)

extracting.label: Step 1: Extraction
extracting.description: Extracting English original text from PDF accurately...
extracting.tip: Extracts proper nouns such as company names and school names as they are

refining.label: Step 2: Refining
refining.description: Selecting core experience based on Korean standards...

translating.label: Step 3: Translation
translating.tip: Translates achievements into professional Korean business language

doneSection.message: Analysis complete! Moving to the next step...

processingPage.footerTip: üí° 3-Step AI Processing: Actual processing time per step is reflected. By first selecting core experiences and then refining them, we provide more accurate and efficient results.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Cake Corporation (hereinafter referred to as the "Company") establishes and discloses the following privacy policy to protect users' personal information and to promptly and smoothly handle grievances related thereto, in accordance with the Act on Promotion of Information and Communications Network Utilization and Information Protection, etc., and the Personal Information Protection Act.

sections.title: Article 1 (Purpose of Collection and Use of Personal Information)
sections.content: The Company processes personal information for the following purposes. The personal information being processed will not be used for purposes other than the following, and if the purpose of use is changed, necessary measures such as obtaining separate consent will be implemented.
items: Membership Registration and Management: Identity verification, personal identification, prevention of illegal use by bad members and unauthorized use, confirmation of intent to join, age verification, handling of complaints, and delivery of notices.
Service Provision: AI resume generation, translation, summary, PDF conversion, content provision, and personalized service provision.
Marketing and Advertising: Development of new services (products) and personalized service provision, provision of event and advertising information and participation opportunities.

sections.title: Article 2 (Items of Personal Information Collected)
sections.content: The Company collects the following personal information for membership registration, consultation, and service application.
items: Required items: Name, email address, profile image (for social login)
Information collected during service use: Access logs, cookies, access IP information, resume data (experience, education, tech stack, etc.)
Information collected during payment: Card company name, card number (partial), payment approval details (processed through PG company)

sections.title: Article 3 (Retention and Use Period of Personal Information)
sections.content: The Company processes and retains personal information within the personal information retention and use period according to laws or the period agreed upon when collecting personal information from the information subject.
items: Membership Registration and Management: Until membership withdrawal (However, if an investigation is underway due to violation of relevant laws, until the investigation is closed)
Provision of Goods or Services: Until the supply of goods/services is completed and payment/settlement is completed

sections.title: Article 4 (Procedure and Method of Destruction of Personal Information)
sections.content: In principle, the Company destroys the information without delay after the purpose of collecting and using personal information is achieved. Information in the form of electronic files is deleted using technical methods that cannot reproduce the record.

sections.title: Article 5 (Chief Privacy Officer)
sections.content: The Company designates a Chief Privacy Officer as follows to take overall responsibility for personal information processing and to handle complaints and damage relief of information subjects related to personal information processing.

sections.title: Article 1 (Purpose)
sections.content: The purpose of these Terms is to regulate the rights, obligations, and responsibilities of the Company and members, and other necessary matters regarding the use of the ApplyGogo service (hereinafter referred to as "Service") operated by Cake Corporation (hereinafter referred to as "Company").

sections.title: Article 2 (Definition of Terms)
items: "Service" refers to AI-based resume conversion and related general services provided by the Company.
"Member" refers to a person who has entered into a service use contract with the Company and uses the services provided by the Company.
"Paid Service" refers to various digital contents and general services provided by the Company for a fee.

sections.title: Article 3 (Effect and Change of Terms)
sections.content: The Company posts the contents of these Terms on the initial screen of the service so that members can easily understand them. The Company may revise these Terms within the scope that does not violate relevant laws, and in case of revision, the application date and reason for revision shall be specified and announced on the initial screen of the service along with the current Terms.

sections.title: Article 4 (Membership Registration)
sections.content: Membership registration is concluded when a user agrees to the contents of the Terms and applies for registration, and the Company approves such application. The Company may withhold or reject approval in the following cases.
items: If the applicant has previously lost membership qualifications under these Terms
If someone else's name is used
If false information is entered or contents presented by the Company are not entered

sections.title: Article 5 (Provision and Change of Service)
sections.content: The Company provides services such as AI resume summary, translation, and PDF conversion to members. The Company may change the contents of the service provided according to changes in technical specifications or other operational needs, and in this case, the changed contents and application date will be specified and announced in advance.

sections.title: Article 6 (Usage Fees and Payment)
sections.content: The service is provided in free and paid (passes, etc.) categories. Usage fees and payment methods for paid services follow what is specified on the relevant service page.

sections.title: Article 7 (Cancellation and Refund Policy)
sections.content: The Company applies the following refund policy considering the characteristics of digital content and services.
items: Full Refund: Within 7 days of purchasing a paid pass, provided that no credits provided through the pass have been used and no services such as AI processing have been used even once.

Non-refundable: If 7 days have passed since purchase, or if credits have been used at least once or AI processing has occurred, it is considered that the value of the digital content has significantly decreased, and refunds are not possible.
No Partial Refund: Since this service is provided as a term-based pass and credit recharge method, partial refunds for early termination are not provided.

sections.title: Article 8 (Privacy Protection)
sections.content: The Company strives to protect the personal information of members as prescribed by relevant laws. Regarding the protection and use of personal information, relevant laws and the Company's Privacy Policy apply.

sections.title: Article 9 (Obligations of Members)
sections.content: Members shall not engage in the following acts.
items: Registration of false information upon application or change
Theft of other people's information
Change of information posted by the Company
Acts that interfere with the legitimate operation of the service
